casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Reisman, Appellant, v. Cuyahoga County Board of Elections et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Reisman, v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Elections (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 1.]

(No. 88-1814 Submitted November 1, 1988 Decided November 2, 1988.) Kahn, Kleinman, Yanowitz&Amson Co., L.P.A., and Sheldon Bems, for appellant. John T. Corrigan, prosecuting attorney, and Michael P. Butler, for appellee Cuyahoga County Board of Elections. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Catherine M. Cola, for appellee Secretary of State.

The judgment of the court of appeals entered October 5, 1988, dismissing relator’s amended petition for a writ of mandamus, is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
